verses.name: Joshua 15:12
verses.text: And the west border was to the great sea, and the coast thereof. This is the coast of the children of Judah round about according to their families.

verses.name: Joshua 15:13
verses.text: And unto Caleb the son of Jephunneh he gave a part among the children of Judah, according to the commandment of the Lord to Joshua, even the city of Arba the father of Anak, which city is Hebron.

verses.name: Joshua 15:14
verses.text: And Caleb drove thence the three sons of Anak, Sheshai, and Ahiman, and Talmai, the children of Anak.
